patches.content:
Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -70,8 +70,9 @@
         <select
           value={genderFilter}
           onChange={(e) => setGenderFilter(e.target.value)}
           className="text-sm px-3 py-2 rounded-lg border border-neutral-300 dark:border-neutral-600 bg-white dark:bg-neutral-700 text-neutral-800 dark:text-white shadow-sm focus:outline-none"
+          aria-label="Gender Filter"
         >
           <option value="">Gender</option>
           <option value="female">Female</option>
           <option value="male">Male</option>

Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -53,10 +53,8 @@
 
     return (
         <div className="p-3 border-t border-neutral-300 dark:border-neutral-700 bg-white dark:bg-neutral-800">
             <div className="flex flex-wrap sm:flex-nowrap gap-3 items-center justify-between">
-                
-
                 <button
                     onClick={() => setSoundOn((prev: boolean) => !prev)}
                     className="text-neutral-700 dark:text-neutral-300 hover:text-blue-600 dark:hover:text-blue-400 transition"
                     title={soundOn ? "Mute Sounds" : "Unmute Sounds"}

Index: =================================================================== --- +++ @@ -78,9 +78,9 @@ type="text" placeholder="Country" value={countryFilter} onChange={(e) => setCountryFilter(e.target.value)} - className="w-[70%] sm:w-auto text-sm px-3 py-2 rounded-lg border border-neutral-300 dark:border-neutral-600 bg-white dark:bg-neutral-700 text-neutral-800 dark:text-white shadow-sm focus:outline-none" + className="w-[60%] sm:w-auto text-sm px-3 py-2 rounded-lg border border-neutral-300 dark:border-neutral-600 bg-white dark:bg-neutral-700 text-neutral-800 dark:text-white shadow-sm focus:outline-none" /> {/* Start/Stop/Skip */}
{renderControlButton()}

Index: =================================================================== --- +++ @@ -78,9 +78,9 @@ type="text" placeholder="Country" value={countryFilter} onChange={(e) => setCountryFilter(e.target.value)} - className="w-[60%] sm:w-auto text-sm px-3 py-2 rounded-lg border border-neutral-300 dark:border-neutral-600 bg-white dark:bg-neutral-700 text-neutral-800 dark:text-white shadow-sm focus:outline-none" + className="w-[70%] sm:w-auto text-sm px-3 py-2 rounded-lg border border-neutral-300 dark:border-neutral-600 bg-white dark:bg-neutral-700 text-neutral-800 dark:text-white shadow-sm focus:outline-none" /> {/* Start/Stop/Skip */}
{renderControlButton()}

           )}
         </button>
 
         {/* Gender Filter */}
-        <select
+       <select
           value={genderFilter}
           onChange={(e) => setGenderFilter(e.target.value)}
-          className="w-[90px] sm:w-auto text-sm px-3 py-2 rounded-lg border border-neutral-300 dark:border-neutral-600 bg-white dark:bg-neutral-700 text-neutral-800 dark:text-white shadow-sm focus:outline-none"
+          className="text-sm px-3 py-2 rounded-lg border border-neutral-300 dark:border-neutral-600 bg-white dark:bg-neutral-700 text-neutral-800 dark:text-white shadow-sm focus:outline-none"

         >
           <option value="">Gender</option>
           <option value="female">Female</option>
           <option value="male">Male</option>
           <option value="other">Other</option>
         </select>
-
         {/* Country Input */}
         <input
           type="text"
           placeholder="Country"
